nodes.text: Ap Kormar played center for the Quent Assassins shockball team. He was a non-Human. When a distant Moff suspected Kormar of harboring Rebel sympathies, he arranged for Kormar to be assassinated by a team of seven individuals posing as Shad Furies fans. They attacked and beat Kormar to death after the Assassins beat the Furies in an overtime match 20-21 at the Imperial City Exhibition Series.
